attributes.action: forget about oxyfuel Clean coal power stations and put the billions of pounds that it would take into building one, and invest into making renewables more effective.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government is considering building a new type of coal powered power station that traps Co2 and stores it under the ground. This process makes the generation of Electricity expensive. It also means we are not looking fully towards the future by going back to fossil fuels. I want the government to stop their investigations & plans now and put the money into scientific research to make Renewable energy more cost effective.
